ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer

Class SimpleClusteringController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer.ClusteringController
      • ch.uzh.agglorecommender.clusterer.SimpleClusteringController

  • public class SimpleClusteringController
extends ClusteringController
    A simple clustering controller that does not allow any user interaction during clustering. The M-V-C pattern with this context does not have a view.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleClusteringController()
      Instantiates a new SimpleClusteringController and a new TreeBuilder.
      SimpleClusteringController(TreeBuilder treeBuilder)
      Instantiates a new SimpleClusteringController that controls the passed TreeBuilder.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClusterResult resumeClusteringRun(java.lang.String pathToWriteSerializedObject)
      Resumes a previously started clustering process.
      ClusterResult startNewClusteringRun(INodeUpdater nodeUpdater, InitialNodesCreator leafNodes, java.lang.String pathToWriteSerializedObject)
      Configurates the TreeBuilder of this controller, starts the clustering process and returns the cluster tree as a ClusterResult.

        public ClusterResult startNewClusteringRun(INodeUpdater nodeUpdater,
                                  InitialNodesCreator leafNodes,
                                  java.lang.String pathToWriteSerializedObject)
        Description copied from class: ClusteringController
        Configurates the TreeBuilder of this controller, starts the clustering process and returns the cluster tree as a ClusterResult.
        Specified by:
        startNewClusteringRun in class ClusteringController
        Parameters:
        nodeUpdater - the node updater to use in the clustering process
        leafNodes - the initial clusters used as leaves in the cluster tree
        pathToWriteSerializedObject - the file system location to write the serialized TreeBuilder
        Returns:
        the cluster result as ClusterResult object.

        Description copied from class: ClusteringController
        Resumes a previously started clustering process.
        Specified by:
        resumeClusteringRun in class ClusteringController
        Parameters:
        pathToWriteSerializedObject - location for the new serialization file. If null no file is created.
        Returns:
        the result of the clustering process
